document_data.mainbody:
he so-called From the Fields was one of the more notable dishes from the city of Velen in the nation of Tethyr.
From the Fields was the name given to rice softcakes, cooked to a crispy crust, then rolled in mashed potatos, onion, and eggs, and served with chopped greens of a wild spicy onion.
As of the late 14 century DR, From the Fields could be found on Blackthorns Brews menu, a festhall on the Captains Cliff in Velen. The dish was mentioned among other notable foods included in Volothamp Geddarms published guide to Amn and Tethyr.
